titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 395) to authorize and direct the Secretary of Energy to sell the Alaska Power Administration, and to authorize the export of Alaska North Slope crude oil, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-314, by Mr. McInnis.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 395. Waiving all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 112.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 361 - 54, 1 Present (Roll no. 770).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/7/1995--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 395 (authorization for the sale of the Alaska Power Administration and exportation of Alaska North Slope crude oil).
